text: The Refurbished: Samsung Odyssey NP800G5H-XS1US i7-7700HQ 16GB 1TB 128GB SSD 15.6in GTX 1060 6GB does what it says on the tin. Good for AAA gaming, but the build material could be better. Had a minor issue with bloatware, but it was resolved. Solid, but not spectacular.

Avoid the Refurbished: Samsung Odyssey NP800G5H-XS1US i7-7700HQ 16GB 1TB 128GB SSD 15.6in GTX 1060 6GB if you can. The NVIDIA GTX 1060 is okay, but the cons outweigh the pros. Fans get extremely loud, like a jet engine.. Looking to return it.

An average performer. The NVIDIA GTX 1060 is good, but I expected a bit more from the screen brightness on the Refurbished: Samsung Odyssey NP800G5H-XS1US i7-7700HQ 16GB 1TB 128GB SSD 15.6in GTX 1060 6GB. It's a fair choice if you can get it on a good deal.

Fantastic gaming laptop for the price. Getting amazing FPS in Starfield and Apex Legends. The build quality of the Refurbished: Samsung Odyssey NP800G5H-XS1US i7-7700HQ 16GB 1TB 128GB SSD 15.6in GTX 1060 6GB is solid, and the screen brightness is a joy to use. A definite 5 stars!

An average performer. The NVIDIA GTX 1060 is good, but I expected a bit more from the battery life on the Refurbished: Samsung Odyssey NP800G5H-XS1US i7-7700HQ 16GB 1TB 128GB SSD 15.6in GTX 1060 6GB. It's a fair choice if you can get it on a good deal.
